name: Color Pals (itch)
description:
A puzzle platformer in which you control 4 characters, everyone with their own power! They will have to help each other if they want to reach the end of the level, for example: pick up a friend and throw him to make a very high jump!

Each color has his own peculiarity: red can go through fire, blue can swim underwater, yellow is immune to electricity an green is the only one able to jump over slime.

A game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, Theme: "Stronger together"

CONTROLS

-Movement: A D, Left arrow Right arrow

-Jump: Spacebar, W, Up arrow

-Pick up/Throw a friend: Shift

-Switch between characters: 1, 2

-Restart Level; R
